title: What Does the Angel Number 27 Mean? (Plus, What to Do When You See It)

steps.title: Noticing the number 27 could be a sign that you’re on the right path.
steps.content: Noticing the number 27 could be a sign that you’re on the right path. You might be struggling with a lack of direction in your life, or you might not be sure that what you’re working toward is the right thing for you. But when you start seeing the number 27 everywhere, your guardian angel may be trying to tell you not to worry, and that you’re right on course. [1] X Research source Stay determined in whatever it is you’re working for, whether that’s getting through school, chasing a new career, or working through a relationship. Your guardian angel is giving you the green light!

steps.title: 27 is a sign to keep pushing toward your goal.
steps.content: 27 is a sign to keep pushing toward your goal. Whether you’re struggling in your spiritual journey or having a tough time in your personal or professional life, 27 comes as a reminder that, no matter the odds, you’re capable of overcoming them. [2] X Research source Hold your chin high, walk confidently, and know that things will work out in your favor. Help yourself on your spiritual journey by improving your self-confidence. Keep a journal of everything you’ve accomplished so far to remind you of what you’re capable of.

steps.title: The number 27 represents balance and harmony in spiritual growth.
steps.content: The number 27 represents balance and harmony in spiritual growth. In numerology, two is the number of balance and duality, as well as inner wisdom. Seven invokes spiritual awareness and enlightenment. When placed side-by-side, they come together to form a powerful combo that promotes harmony and peace in your process of spiritual growth. [3] X Research source Also, 2 and 7 add up to 9, which represents conclusions or self-sacrifice, suggesting that your efforts will be worth it. 27 is also a master number, meaning it has more power than other numbers, and its influence is more strongly felt. The number 2 also represents the intuitive self, and is a reminder to follow your intuition or intuitive voice.

steps.title: The number 27 reminds you that you and your partner are a team.
steps.content: The number 27 reminds you that you and your partner are a team. If you’re in a relationship, it could be that you’ve hit a bit of a rough patch, or you and your partner don’t seem to communicate as well as you used to. The angel number 27 is here to remind you that though the two of you are separate people, you’re also a unit that can work in harmony to strengthen your bonds. [4] X Research source Communicate better in your relationship by using “I” statements to make your feelings known. For example, say, “I feel like we’ve grown apart lately, and I want to get closer again. How about dinner on Friday?”

steps.title: If you’re single, 27 could be a sign that love is on the way.
steps.content: If you’re single, 27 could be a sign that love is on the way. Just as 27 tells you that, spiritually, you’re on the right path, it also means that in matters of love, you’re headed in the right direction. It could be that someone special is right around the corner! They might also come a bit further down the line, but in any case, they’re on their way, so don’t lose hope. Find out if you’re ready for a relationship by examining your own feelings. Would a partner help you grow spiritually? Are you ready to help a possible partner grow, themselves?

steps.title: 27 reminds you to choose your friends wisely.
steps.content: 27 reminds you to choose your friends wisely. Seeing the number 27 indicates that the universe wants you to grow, but to do so, you need to surround yourself with the right people. [5] X Research source With a good friend by your side, the two of you can collaborate and learn from each other, furthering your spiritual journeys. To make new friends, be curious about strangers! Ask them what they’re reading, where they’re headed, what they do for fun. You just might meet your next lifelong companion.

steps.title: The number 27 could mean that you’re about to meet your twin flame.
steps.content: The number 27 could mean that you’re about to meet your twin flame. Your twin flame is someone who shares the same soul, and who helps you grow spiritually. Since 27 is the angle number of harmony in spiritual growth and enlightenment, it’s a pretty strong sign that your twin flame is somewhere nearby, ready to help you on your spiritual path. You’ll probably know right away when you do meet your twin flame—the connection will be immediate, and it’ll feel like looking into a mirror. Do you think you’ve already met your twin flame? Take the quiz to see if it’s true!

steps.title: 27 suggests prosperity or new career paths.
steps.content: 27 suggests prosperity or new career paths. You might be feeling unhappy or stagnant in your current career. The angel number 27 is a sign that prosperity and harmony are coming to your professional life. This could mean that your current job is about to change for the better, or that you might find a new opportunity in a better career sometime soon. Keep your mind open to new job possibilities. Is there something you’ve always wanted to try, but haven’t had the chance? Take a chance! 27 is here to let you know that things will work out.

steps.title: The number 27 is a reminder to check in on your mental health.
steps.content: The number 27 is a reminder to check in on your mental health. It’s true that 27 typically means you’re on the right path. [6] X Research source But sometimes, we forget to take care of ourselves while we’re on that path, and our physical and mental health can fall by the wayside. The angel number 27, though, promotes harmony, meaning you have to help yourself in order for things to work out. Improve your mental health by taking a break from whatever it is you’re working toward. It’ll still be there when you come back, and you’ll return refreshed and ready to tackle it. Also, check in on your physical health. Take a moment to ask yourself how you’re feeling, if you’re getting enough sleep, or if there are any small issues you’ve been ignoring until now.

steps.title: The number 27 appears many times in the Bible.
steps.content: The number 27 appears many times in the Bible. The New Testament has 27 books. Abraham, often called the patriarch of faith, is mentioned by name 27 times in the Bible. The 27th chapter of the Book of Proverbs has 27 verses, and the Book of Leviticus itself has 27 chapters. [7] X Research source All these instances come together to lend great spiritual power to the number 27, which is why your guardian angel uses it as a tool to get your attention. Also, the words “mercy seat” appear 27 times in the Bible. This is also known as the ark of the covenant, or where God was said to manifest among the Hebrews. [8] X Research source

steps.title: Keep working toward your goals.
steps.content: Keep working toward your goals. Yes, the number 27 means that you’re on the right path. [9] X Research source But that doesn’t mean it’s time to ease up on the gas! Stay dedicated to your goals, take breaks when you need to, and keep your eye on the prize. You’re headed in the right direction, but you need to keep moving in order to get there! Work smarter, not harder by prioritizing your tasks in order of importance, asking yourself if you can get more than one thing done at the same time, and avoiding procrastination .

steps.title: Stay optimistic that everything will work out.
steps.content: Stay optimistic that everything will work out. You might feel like you’re in a rut, or that things just aren’t going your way. The angel number 27 comes as reassurance that, even if you feel like you can’t go on, you’re doing the right thing, and your compass is pointing in the right direction. [10] X Research source Stay optimistic and don’t let yourself get beaten down. Any time you notice yourself having negative thoughts, redirect them by thinking things like, “I’m capable of succeeding,” and, “I know I can figure this out.”

steps.title: Ask for help when you need it.
steps.content: Ask for help when you need it. The numbers 2 and 7 promote harmony and growth. [11] X Research source They also come as a reminder that other people are often necessary when working through a problem. If you find that you’re stuck, don’t hesitate to ask someone for help . Two minds are better than one! Communicate your needs by telling others, in simple terms, what it is that you want and how you think they might be able to help. For example, “I want to finish this essay by tonight. Can you save me some time by getting the groceries for me?"
